name: Precalculus
description: A course that covers basic algebra and trigonometry.

name: Calculus I & II
description: This course covers the fundamentals of Calculus, including functions, derivatives and integrals.

name: Linear Algebra
description: This course provides an introduction to linear algebra, including matrices, vector spaces, linear transformations and systems of linear equations.

name: Differential Equations
description: This course covers the basics of differential equations, including first-order equations, linear systems of equations, and nonlinear equations.

name: Applied Mathematics
description: This course covers the application of mathematical methods to solve real-world problems in engineering, science, and economics.
